attributes.action: The Legalization Of | Lysergic acid diethylamide
attributes.additional_details:
Hello, I'm likely not to receive many signatures, but I hope the people who know how Psychedelics change the world for better will sign. Thank you.
LSD refers to Lysergic acid diethylamide, a psychedelic drug illegal in the United Kingdom.
A) LSD use is a victimless crime. If someone ingests LSD, no one is being victimized in any way, shape, or form.
B) LSD is less addictive than many legal drugs in the UK.
C) Only one person has ever died of LSD overdose. However, this man died of because of his own ignorance. He was under the impression that the LSD was speed, ergo, he ingested 320 G of LSD, which is much higher than the recommended dosage. However, more than one person has died of alcohol poisoning.

D) LSD has medical uses, where as alcohol and tobacco, do not. If nothing else, this should make LSD a class B drug instead of a class A one
Physical Harm & Dependence Graph:- http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3119/3158844484_5a9fb0fd37.jpg?v=0.
Lethal Dosage:- 12,000 ug
